eventsFunctions.name: SummonNotifyCircle

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: This behaviour is for enemies. It controls their pathfinding and health.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: EnemyV2

eventsFunctions.description: Slows the enemy when hit with a certain projectile.
eventsFunctions.name: slow
eventsFunctions.sentence: [Upon Contact with _PARAM3_]  Set the speed of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM4_x for _PARAM5_ seconds

parameters.description: Pathfinding behaviour is needed in order to tweak the speed of the object
parameters.name: Pathfinding

parameters.description: The projectile that will cause the slow effect.
parameters.name: Projectile

parameters.description: The slow effect will multiply the original speed by this number.
parameters.name: SpeedMultiplier

parameters.description: The duration of the slow effect (in seconds).
parameters.name: Duration

eventsFunctions.description: Allows selected enemies to inflict the Negative Thoughts effect (decreased firing speed) when they pass by towers in their AoE.
eventsFunctions.name: InflictSlow
eventsFunctions.sentence: [For each _PARAM0_] Inflict Negative Thoughts for _PARAM2_ within _PARAM3_ pixels unless _PARAM4_ is near and add _PARAM5_

parameters.description: The towers that the enemies will slow (default: All)
parameters.name: AffectedTowers

parameters.description: The area of effect (in pixels). If the towers are below this distance from the enemy they will be inflicted with the effect.
parameters.name: AoE

parameters.description: Tower that protects others against effects
parameters.name: EffectProtector

eventsFunctions.description: Change the target position for the enemy's pathfinding
eventsFunctions.name: changeTarget
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change _PARAM0_ target position to X _PARAM2_ and Y _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Will make the enemy spin and not move permanently.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Slip enemy when contact with Sprite
eventsFunctions.name: slip
eventsFunctions.sentence: [On contact with _PARAM2_] _PARAM0_ slips and cannot get up

eventsFunctions.description: Hurt the enemy.
eventsFunctions.name: damage

eventsFunctions.description: Hurt the enemy on collision with the selected Sprite
eventsFunctions.fullName: Hurt enemy when collide with Sprite
eventsFunctions.name: collide

eventsFunctions.description: Update the linked health bar for the enemy.
eventsFunctions.name: updateHealthBar

parameters.description: Object type of enemy health bar
parameters.name: HealthBar

eventsFunctions.description: Update the Firefighter's Hitmarker on this Enemy.
eventsFunctions.name: updateHitmarker

propertyDescriptors.label: Pathfinding used to automatically find exit
propertyDescriptors.name: Pathfinder

eventsFunctions.description: Fire a bullet at an enemy.
eventsFunctions.name: attack
eventsFunctions.sentence: Fire _PARAM2_ (damage multiplier _PARAM5_x) from _PARAM0_ at _PARAM3_ at volume _PARAM4_

parameters.description: Input the projectile to be shot.
parameters.name: Projectile

parameters.description: Volume to play sound effect at
parameters.name: Volume

eventsFunctions.description: Spawn a trap at the nearest path, according to SpawnX and SpawnY of the given Tower
eventsFunctions.fullName: Spawn a trap at the nearest path
eventsFunctions.name: spawnTrap
eventsFunctions.sentence: Spawn _PARAM2_ (damage multiplier: _PARAM3_x) at nearest path from _PARAM0_

eventsFunctions.description: Attacks but i put all the repeated code in here
eventsFunctions.name: smartAttack
eventsFunctions.sentence: Using _PARAM0_, attack _PARAM2_ by shooting _PARAM3_, playing sound effect at volume _PARAM4_

parameters.description: Volume to play sound effect at
parameters.name: Volume

eventsFunctions.description: Trapping but i stole the code from smart attack but its for trapping now
eventsFunctions.name: smartTrap

eventsFunctions.description: Set the object variables correctly, run this every frame
eventsFunctions.name: applyEffectVars
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the object variables of _PARAM0_ according to _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_ and _PARAM4_ and spawn _PARAM5_ and _PARAM6_ (alongside _PARAM8_)

eventsFunctions.description: Force set the object variables correctly, run this every frame
eventsFunctions.name: forceApplyVars
eventsFunctions.sentence: Force update object variables of _PARAM0_ according to _PARAM2_, _PARAM3_ and _PARAM4_ and update _PARAM5_ and _PARAM6_ (alongside _PARAM8_)

eventsFunctions.description: Remove all particles from a Tower.

eventsFunctions.name: selectivelyRemoveParticles

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if enemy is in range, taking into account boosts
eventsFunctions.name: enemyInRange

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Gives the object characteristics of a projectile. Set it's speed and damage as object variables before using this behaviour.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ProjectileV2
